title: Why should we learn by doing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because information is not knowledge Ain’t it right dear Einstein?  Information is the recipe how to cook a dinner. Knowledge is getting your kitchen messy and actually bringing the food on a plate. Now, what gets you full? See? So, learn by doing https://inex.life/product/inex-results-oriented-learning/

Great Philosophical Question! I myself at one point, and likely many others, have wondered this question. I think that the goal of learning, is to master what you want to do. Thus, doing what you want to learn is teaching you. Perhaps there could be a better way of learning, but I think that currently this is the best way of learning! Hope this Helped!
